welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tambaram, a vibrant city known for its rich cultural heritage and bustling markets. We hope you enjoy exploring the city's charming streets, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals. Have a wonderful time discovering all that Tambaram has to offer!
